C

camRotateA(Camera) - Static method in class operations.CreateCamera
 
camRotateC(Camera) - Static method in class operations.CreateCamera
 
clamp(ArrayList<Enemy>) - Method in class operations.BoundsClamp
this method takes an arraylist of enemies and will extract the node(3D object) that is the enemy and check it is within the 3D box for the game if the enemy is outside the world clamp with make the velocity negitive and the enemy will change direction if the enemy hits the ground they are removed
clampX(ArrayList<Enemy>) - Method in class operations.BoundsClamp
clamp the contents of the world 3D box within the x dimension also adds velocity to the movement of the enemies in the x dimension
clampY(ArrayList<Enemy>) - Method in class operations.BoundsClamp
clamp the contents of the 3D workd Box within the Y dimension also adds velocity to the movement of the enemies in the y dimension
clampZ(ArrayList<Enemy>) - Method in class operations.BoundsClamp
clamp the contents of the 3D world box within the Z dimension also adds velocity to the movement of the enemies in the z dimension
clear(Group) - Method in class operations.CreateBox
clear the entire scene of enemies
CreateBox - Class in operations
this class is the class that creates 3D object for use in your games the classes are called from the Main class or internally to make larger groups of 3D objects as groups
CreateBox() - Constructor for class operations.CreateBox
 
CreateCamera - Class in operations
this method creates the camera and camera transforms so the camera can be moved or relocated see glen if you want to learn more about cameras or movement of view in a three d world
CreateCamera() - Constructor for class operations.CreateCamera
 
currLoc - Variable in class operations.Enemy
